title: Aesop's Fables/ the Animal Alphabet
brief_description: Bill Cosby stars as Aesop, the master storyteller in this delightful program that combines live action with animation. Bill Cosby journeys through an enchanted forest with his two young human friends as the famous fable “The Tortoise and the Hare” unfolds. This wonderfully entertaining program featuring outstanding animation and original music can be enjoyed by children of all ages. Also featured on this video is “The Animal Alphabet”. Rated: G
